channel.title: devices on Pseudoyu
channel.description: Recent content in devices on Pseudoyu

item.title: Thin Client Development Workflow Based on frp Internal Network Penetration
item.description: 'Here After Us - Mayday' Preface In my previous project “GitHub - Personal Toolbox”, I mentioned that I have a Mac Studio that’s always on at home and a Raspberry Pi 3b+ microcomputer running Ubuntu. When at home, I usually operate the Mac Studio connected to a monitor or access it via SSH from my Chromebook terminal. After ending remote work, I need to commute between the office and home daily.

item.title: Personal Toolkit (May 2022)
item.description: 'Here After Us - Mayday' Preface I’ve always been a tool enthusiast, firmly believing in the principle “to do a good job, one must first sharpen one’s tools.” I constantly tinker with and optimize my hardware and software, seeking the best solution for each specific need. Now, I’ve gradually found solutions that best suit my usage habits. Due to work, study, and personal interests, my devices have gone through many iterations.
